error.signature: the trait `Unpin` is not implemented for `impl Future<Output = T>`
error.regex: the trait `Unpin` is not implemented for.*Future

verdict.summary: Async futures are not Unpin by default. Use Box::pin or pin! macro to handle self-referential futures.

dead_ends.action: Implement Unpin for the future type manually
dead_ends.why_fails: Self-referential futures are unsound to move; manually implementing Unpin breaks safety guarantees

workarounds.action: Use Box::pin() to pin the future on the heap
workarounds.how:
let fut = Box::pin(async { ... });
// or for trait objects: Box<dyn Future<Output=T> + Send>

workarounds.action: Use tokio::pin! or std::pin::pin! macro for stack pinning

leads_to.condition: When pinned future also needs to be Send

preceded_by.condition: When fixing Send issues reveals Unpin requirements

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Send is about thread safety; Unpin is about whether a future can be moved in memory after being polled
